scripts.build: npm run ngc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run ngc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build android && ns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run ngc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build ios && ns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run ngc && cd ../demo && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run ngc && cd ../demo && ns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run ngc && cd ../demo-ng && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios.aot: npm run ngc && cd ../demo-ng && ns run ios --bundle --env.uglify --env.aot --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run ngc && cd ../demo-ng && ns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.android.aot: npm run ngc && cd ../demo-ng && ns run android --bundle --env.uglify --env.aot --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.reset: cd ../demo-ng && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-sentry && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.ng.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && ns plugin remove nativescript-sentry && ns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.setup.ng: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && npm i
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-sentry && cd ../src
scripts.development.setup.ng: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo-ng && npm link nativescript-sentry && cd ../src
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" ns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" ns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
